short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to upload receipts to automatically create Expense draft entries on Morning (ex Greeninvoice)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can easily snap and upload expense receipts to your accounting program simply from your browser. Not an official application, requires access via API. API is available only on tariff plans starting with "Popular".

Open source project: https://github.com/Flatroy/morning-browser-extension feel free to send pull requests
